import React from 'react' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import styles from './Cards.module.css' const Cards=({data :{confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}}) =>{ if(!confirmed){ return 'Loading' } return(
Infected {confirmed.value} REAL DATE Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered REAL DATA REAL DATE Number of recovered cases of COVID-19 Deaths REAL DATA REAL DATE Number of deaths cases of COVID-19
) } export default Cards
